comment: My favorite Professor ever. The class is an easy A, and his lectures are so entertaining. He is just well spoken and charming. The class consists of a lot of online hw, 4 exams, and 2 projects but theyre very reasonable. Take his class.
Honestly the best professor Ive had so far. Great guy, makes lectures entertaining, gives extra credit. I highly recommend taking him

He was probably one of the best professors I've taken. The material was semi-difficult. Pretty funny and makes lecture fly by. There is extra credit that can increase your grade by about half a letter grade. There is a lot of hw that can take time but is just completion grade. Attendance wasn't required but helps. Definitely a recommended professor
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: I took Professor Lyle for Financial Accounting and took him again for Managerial Accounting. He is one of if not the best professor I have had so far at KSU. If I didn't take him I probably would have failed this class. He makes the information engaging and easy to understand. Easy grader, lots of extra credit, and understanding about absences.

Professor Lyle is a great teacher not the typical guy that just reads off slides and doesn't care. He genuinely cares about helping you and making sure you understand the material. Will respond to emails quickly and answers any questions after class. test weren't hard as long as you did the practices. homework is simple enough.
Gives a clear schedule of all assignments due and is not a harsh grader at all. So many extra credit opportunities and practice assignments that will get you to your A!

Professor Lyle made everything clear from day 1 as to what we had to do to pass this class. I will say there is quite a bit of work you have to do as there is tons of homework, discussions, quizzes, smart connects, a group project, but if you study it's super easy. He also offered lots of bonus assignments as well. 10/10 recommend!

I loved Professor Lyle and will be taking him again for managerial accounting. His lectures were the best part of class and he made accounting easy to understand for newcomers. Gave every opportunity he could for extra credit and did not grade harshly. Take him for ACCT2101!
